pageContent:
Nikhil Rambole 
Content Developer Program Manager 
Executive Summary 
Dynamic Content Developer and Program Manager with over 10 years of experience in content 
design,  strategy,  and  project/program  management.  Proven  track  record  of  leading  digital 
transformations and delivering value through strategic roadmaps and enterprise-level SAP and 
non-SAP transformations. Adept at collaborating with C-suite executives, conducting high-impact 
workshops,  and  delivering  presentations  on  strategy  and  transformation.  Strong  ability  to 
articulate program value and showcase client value realization. Excellent verbal and written 
communication skills, with a focus on driving customer success. Certified PMP professional with 
experience managing P&L of accounts over $20M+ with 80+ team members globally. Diversified 
experience in Healthcare, Government, Banking and Financial Services, Tech, Insurance, Retail, and 
Manufacturing sectors having worked in the USA, UK, APAC.
